definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The seasonal sea level change is of annual period and the second oscillation is of semi-annual period.
sentences.chinese: 月平均海面以年週期振動爲主，其次是半年週期。

sentences.english: Then he saw one on the surface swimming in circles.
sentences.chinese: 接着他看見其中的一條在海面上繞着圈兒遊着。

sentences.english: LUPIT benefited from very high ocean heat content and intensification rate has been fast.
sentences.chinese: 受惠於極高海面熱含量，盧碧增強的速度頗快。

sentences.english: In the harbor sailboats are easily cruising on the blue and peaceful water.
sentences.chinese: 海港中，帆船在湛藍而平靜的海面上飄來飄去。

sentences.english: The ocean looks very beautiful. The moonlight glimmers on its surface.
sentences.chinese: 海洋真美，月光在海面上閃躍。

sentences.english: The ground slopes gown to the sea.
Not for 4 and 2 above sea-level storm over open water.
sentences.chinese: 不能用於4級風浪以上海面及二級以上開放河道。

sentences.english: Then the gates of his heart were flung open, and his joy flew far over the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他的心門砉然地開了，他的喜樂在海面飛翔。

sentences.english: The sun is dipping swiftly into the sea.
The plane just brushed the surface of the sea.
A red sun rose thinly from the calm sea.
sentences.chinese: 一輪紅日從平靜的海面淡淡升起。

sentences.english: Battleships would attack on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 戰艦也可以在海面上展開攻擊。

sentences.english: We also spent a late night squid fishing on the open ocean under a crescent moon.
sentences.chinese: 更於一個夜晚，在一輪明月下，無涯海面上網補魷魚。

sentences.english: Time has finished reading right away having spent three section of class's like this "float out sea surface ".
sentences.chinese: 就這麼花了三節課的時間讀完了《浮出海面》。

sentences.english: The undersea battle is about to begin.
sentences.chinese: 海面下的戰爭正要開始。

sentences.english: Out at sea it was calm . No wind came up .
sentences.chinese: 在遠處的海面上，卻一片寧靜，連風也沒有。

definition: dry land (as opposed to the sea)
